backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing an update to change experience text to 8+ years in AboutSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing brief descriptions of various frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground settings.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, fonts, and script loading for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling all portfolio sections with background effects and navigation.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/AboutS: About section displaying updated 8+ years experience text with reveal animation and neon styling.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Backgr: Fixed background layer rendering animated geometric shapes, noise texture, and glowing orbs.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Contac: Contact section with form submission via mailto link, contact details, and social links.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Experi: Animated vertical timeline showing past job roles with glowing nodes and staggered reveal.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/HeroSe: Hero banner with name, title, 8+ years experience, CTA buttons, and animated hero image.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Renders a grid of project cards with animations triggered by in-view detection.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Skills: Displays a responsive grid of skill badges with reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/StatsC: Shows an animated count-up statistic when scrolled into view.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/TopNav: Implements a responsive top navigation bar with smooth scrolling and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook to create and manage an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refresh dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountUpOnce.ts: Custom hook that animates a number counting up once when the element enters view.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInViewReveal.ts: Hook that detects when an element becomes visible and triggers a visibility flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, neon-themed utility classes, and Tailwind layers for the UI.
frontend/src/lib/scroll.ts: Provides smooth scrolling to page sections with offset handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content scanning paths, extended color system using OKLCH variables, custom neon shadows, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, including schema version, site summary, design/architecture notes, contact updates, and a list of existing features with requirements.
